entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
